question.title: SwipeRefreshLayout with Webview + nested scrolling
question.body:
I'm trying to use SwipeRefreshLayout with WebView.

I'm facing the problem where in the middle of page, when user scrolls down, unwanted refresh kicks in. Also when there are nested scrolling and parent scrollbar is at top and there is some child container in the webview let's take iframe , when I try to scroll down into iframe or some child container then also unwanted refresh kicks in even when I am in the middle of the child container.

How do I make the refresh event only happen when webview's scroll position is at the top. (ie, he's looking at the top portion of the page)?

question_comments.body: Please provide enough code so others can better understand or reproduce the problem.
